data.text: @ladybossAU Hi @ladybossAU, sorry to hear about your difficulties using Jetstar App. You may try basic troubleshooting such as un-install and re-installing the app. Hope that helps. Thanks - Kimmy

@ClaireMurph Hi Claire! We’re so glad that our airport staff was on-hand to help make your experience with us a great one. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure it’ll make their day!) – Kimmy
@electricrabbit0 Hi Matt, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie
@SharonEGood Hi Sharon, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Feel free to send us a DM if you require assistance with your booking. Thanks - Leslie

@electricrabbit0 Hi Matt, we do our best to seat families together and our check-in staff are always on hand at the airport to make sure that young children are seated with a parent or guardian on the day of travel. If you need assistance with your booking now-feel free to DM us. Thanks – Jen
@matty_u2 Hi Mathew, I understand that you're concerned about possible changes in your schedule. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? Thanks - Kimmy

@fredisaperson22 Hi there, sorry to hear about your delayed flights. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. – Mauri
@TweetingOz Hi there, I can understand how important this is for you. Once there is an update from our Baggage team, you will be contacted. - Jaya

@deanbogga Hi Dean, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Feel free to send us a DM if you require assistance with rebooking your flight or would like to explore alternative options. Thanks - Leslie
@MixtUpMixy Hi there, sorry to hear you're having trouble reaching us. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Leslie

urls.title: Checking in: Getting to the airport: domestic flights | Jetstar
urls.description: When's the best time to get to the airport? Here's our comprehensive guide to when to get to the airport for domestic Jetstar flights.

data.text: @metherall Hi Lucas, thanks for reaching out. You may know more about domestic flight check-in time here: https://t.co/wima9QtWEI. - Jay

@Hana10163172302 Hi TaminaS, I'm sorry to hear about your delayed flight. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Can you DM us with your booking details? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jay
@r0ck3tsurge0n Hi Michael, sorry for any inconvenience this delay has caused. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy
@BriiJayx Hi @BriiJayx, sorry for any inconvenience this changes has caused you. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kimmy
@Todd_Sal Hi Todd, sorry for any inconvenience this has caused. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy
@AppliedDemog Hi Tom, sorry to hear your flight was delayed. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into this further? Thanks - Leslie
@LiangRhea Hi Rhea, sorry to hear that you're having trouble reaching us. We'd like to look into this further. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can assist? Thanks – Leslie

data.text: @BethanyinCBR Hi Bethany, thanks for reaching out. I can confirm the airport itself is called ‘Ayers Rock Airport’ (IATA Airport Code AYQ). Jetstar’s marketing of the route refers to Uluru. Thanks – Leslie
@HowmanyMs Hi M, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie

@Nibzeee Hi Bruce, sorry to hear your mother's flight has been cancelled. If you require assistance with rebooking the flight or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks – Leslie
@HeartBeatRock1 Hi there, sorry to hear that you haven't taken off yet. Would you mind sending us a DM please? We may be able to provide more details about your flight. Thanks- Jen

@t_charn522 @t_charn522 Hey there, I'm sorry to hear about the delayed flight. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully you’ll be on your way soon. You may DM us with your booking details if you require further assistance. Thanks - Jay
@neph_ning That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, @neph_ning. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Jaya
@sehaj_mehra Hi Sehaj, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference and complete name to assist you further? Thanks - Jeff
@pledistaff That’s not the standard we set for our aircraft, @pledistaff – thanks for letting us know. We’ve passed this onto our cleaners. - Vi
@_nicks_tweets Hi Nick, sorry to hear this. We'd like to look into this further, would you mind sending us a DM with more info. Thanks - Jeff
@doreen_blyth Hi Doreen, sorry to hear your flight was cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi
@whoisluanak Hi Lulu, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. – Jeff
@johnpollard58 @johnpollard58 Hi, we're sorry to hear your flight has been delayed. Please PM us and quote JQINV585 so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks – Mauri
@CainMcCleary Hi Cain, sorry to hear about your experience at the airport. If you require any assistance with your booking, you can send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi

@MamaCranky @MamaCranky Hi there, sorry to hear that your kids are waiting. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see the information about the flight. Would you mind sending us a DM, please? Thanks – Mauri

@benjsoph Hi Sophie, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled and that you're unable to reach us. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi

@ThomasP58269756 Hi Thomas, sorry to hear about the disruptions. We know how inconvenient delayed flights can be so we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need assistance with your booking, you may send us a PM and quote INV585 to speak with an agent. – Paul

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @Dawesy05 Hi @Dawesy05, sorry to hear that you've left a pair of sunglasses onboard. Our baggage team is best placed to assist with this. For more info and to speak with them directly, you can visit https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks - Vi
@HaCauNoi @HaCauNoi Sorry to hear your flight got delayed, would you mind sending us a DM please - we may be able to provide more details about your delayed flight. Thanks - Mauri
@thesheika @thesheika I’m sorry to hear this Ali and thanks for taking time sharing your feedback. I’ll pass this to the team. – Jay
@TheoZographos Hi Theo, I can see how upsetting this is for you. Would you mind sending us a DM please  - we may be able to provide more details about your delayed flight. Thanks- Jen
@JacquiWitt Hi Jacqui, I'm sorry our system isn't making this easy for you. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We'd appreciate the chance to assist you with this. Thanks - Jaya
@SabreVDM @SabreVDM Hi, sorry to hear that. Could you send us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Paul
@Dawesy05 Hey @Dawesy05. We’re so glad Cheryl was on-hand to help make your experience with us a great one. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure it’ll make their day!) Thanks- Jen

@deformo96 Hi @deformo96, I understand how upsetting it can be when you've made plans in advance and the flight got changed. If you require further assistance with your Jetstar booking, such as making any changes, please PM us and quote JQINV585 to speak with an agent. Thanks –Jen
@ameet043 Hi Ameet, I understand how important this is for you. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jaya

@andrei_a022 Hi Andrei, I'm sorry for any inconvenience this has caused for you and your family. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kimmy

data.text: @JustBreeTW Hi Bree, sorry to hear about your difficulties with changing your meal online. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info for us to further assist? Thanks - Kimmy

@anjapannek Hi Anja, I appreciate how upsetting this must be for you. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require assistance with your Jetstar booking, please send us a DM. Thanks - Kimmy
@minombrerany Hi @minombrerany, sorry to hear about the delay on your flight. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi

@inbetweensuns Hi @inbetweensuns, sorry to hear your flight has been canceled. We know how inconvenient canceled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi
@Vagrant_Sam @Vagrant_Sam Hi, thanks for taking your time sharing this with us. I'll make sure to pass this feedback on to the team. - Paul
@nightlight_zero Hi Leon, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. Thanks - Jeff
@Vagrant_Sam Hi @Vagrant_Sam, while delays are hard to plan for, you can be certain that our team are working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. –  Jeff
@kateeekins Hi Kate, thanks for reaching out! We would like to look into this. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference and registered name in the booking? Thanks - Jeff

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @smiddy_the Hi @smiddy_the, we're sorry for the inconvenience caused. Our baggage team is best placed to assist you with this and can be reached here - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks – Vi

urls.title: Baggage transfers and flight connections | Jetstar
urls.description: If you have a connecting connecting domestic and international flight, here's everything you need to know about your checked baggage.

data.text: @kateeekins Hi Kate, thanks for reaching out. In most cases, you’ll need to collect your baggage, check in again and transfer your bags. Our check-in staff will let you know if your baggage will be transferred. You may also check this link for more info https://t.co/BAA3yvpavw Thanks - Kimmy

@CoraliePate Hi Coralie, the website is definitely still taking bookings at this time. We recommend clearing your cookies and cache, then trying again. It may also help using another browser or device. Thanks – Paul

@jwgayler Hi John, sorry to hear about your delayed flight. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. If you require assistance with your Jetstar booking, you may send us a DM. Thanks - Paul
@GazalaAnver Hi Gazala, sorry to hear this. I appreciate you taking the time to provide me with your comments. Please be assured that I will be passing your feedback to the team. Thanks - Kimmy
@SueWilson_235 Hi @SueWilson_235, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kimmy

@SkyBlueSainter Hi @SkyBlueSainter, sorry that you're having difficulties managing your booking online. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kimmy
@lukenightingal0 Hi Luke, thanks for reaching out. Could you send us a DM with more info for us to help you with your request? Thanks - Kimmy
@rhysdunn Hi Rhys, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Leslie
@ryanhackett3 Hi Ryan, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. Would you mind sending us a DM, so we can look into things for you? Thanks - Leslie
@BigFatHarry Hi Harry, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi
@Madguyca Hi Adam, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into your options and assist? Thanks - Vi

@Jewelangel Hi Julia, I know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble allocating your seats. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@John99479929 Hi John, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully you’ll be on your way soon. Thanks - Jeff
@Dimi_Blue Hi Sam, I'm sorry for your loss. I'd appreciate to look into this further and see what I can do. Would you mind sending us a DM with more details? Thanks - Jay

@darienspaceship Hi @darienspaceship, sorry to hear about the canceled flight and that you're unable to reach us. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi
@KitaaJ_ That’s not the standard we set for our aircraft,@KitaaJ_– thanks for letting us know. We’ve passed this onto our cleaners - so hopefully you see less mess next time you fly with us! - Jen
@rogerwilkinson3 Hi Roger, that’s the kind of feedback we love to hear! – and we’re sure our team will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! – Kimmy

data.text: @steedencentral Hi @steedencentral, thanks for reaching out. You can bring your own water onboard however, you must be aware of our Liquids, Aerosols and Gels restrictions if you're departing from an international terminal. You can find full info about this here https://t.co/4b3q7AYt6S - Jen

@tigertragic2 @tigertragic2 Hi there, sorry to hear your flight got changed. We'd appreciate a chance to check this for you. Could you please DM us, so we can look into your options and assist? Thanks – Mauri

urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @dol0rres Hi Dolorres, sorry to hear this. Our baggage team are best placed to assist with this. For more info and speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/6zamkVerFx. Thanks - Leslie

@regentwanderer Hi @regentwanderer, sorry to hear you're having trouble with your Jetstar app. Please uninstall the app then re-install it and kindly try it again. If an error still occurs, please send us a DM here for further assistance. Thanks - Norine
@vjet707 Hi there, sorry to hear your flight is delayed. We do our best to avoid this – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. – Leslie

@Ian_MJ1 Hi Ian, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. We do our best to avoid this unless it’s absolutely necessary. Feel free to DM us if you require assistance with your booking. Thanks - Leslie
@Ahlephia That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Rhiannon – and we’re sure our team will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! – Kimmy
@exvkg Hi Alistair, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to Newcastle. Thanks - Leslie

data.text: @marinalala Hi Marinalala, the use of masks is mandatory on all our flights, except where a medical exemption exists. We have escalated your concerns to management to follow up with our relevant teams to ensure team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. – Leslie

@choirul_hidayat Hi Choirul, sorry for the inconvenience this delayed flight has caused. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info?  We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kimmy
@EmsilyR Hi Emily, I understand how inconvenient it is to have missing baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks – Kimmy

urls.title: Checking in: Getting to the airport: international | Jetstar
urls.description: When's the best time to get to the airport? Here's our complete guide to when to get to the airport for international Jetstar flights.

data.text: @MamaCranky For more information on when to get to the airport for international flights, you can check it here -- https://t.co/7T3KPjcw2c. Thanks - Norine 2/2

@MamaCranky Hi @MamaCranky, I know you want your teens to have a smooth flight. We always advise our passengers to make sure they arrive at the airport with plenty of time. For international flights, we recommend being at the check-in counter at least 3 hrs before the flight departure. 1/2

@olamy Hi Olivier, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient it can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks - Jaya

@fhina_ar Hi Arfina, I know waiting can be hard. I've checked your case and I can see that your Case Manager is still conducting an investigation into your baggage. You can reply to the email that was sent to you or feel free to send us a DM if you need further assistance. Thanks - Norine

@Ben_Whitmore Hi Ben, sorry to hear about what happened. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require further assistance with your Jetstar booking, please send us a DM. Thanks - Paul
@alykesandra It’s less about making a profit and more about being able to keep the costs of our airfares down. Feel free to send us a DM here if you need further assistance. Thanks - Norine 2/2

@alykesandra Hi Alexandra, I understand paying extra fees on the day is never ideal. Your carry-on allowance is separate from your checked baggage allowance, so if your carry-on is over the weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee. 1/2
@SimonStaxPoker Hi Simon, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi
@pwtravelphoto Pretty indeed! Thanks for sharing this amazing photo, Peter! 😊 - Jaya

data.text: @devilish_babi Hi Leah, I appreciate that paying for excess baggage at the airport can be frustrating. We limit carry-on to 7kgs in total for each passenger including handbags and laptop bags– so if your carry-on is over the weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee. - Jaya

@GameProReviews Hi @GameProReviews, sorry to hear this. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require assistance with your Jetstar booking, please send us a DM. Thanks - Vi

@NicKONe52515108 Hi Nick, sorry for the inconvenience this has caused you. For Car hire booking, payment will be required in local currency to the car rental company. It'll depend on them the option to pay the car hire. You can find more info here https://t.co/ogPDiOqskU. Thanks - Kimmy
@NoonanJustin Hi Justin. I appreciate how upsetting cancelled flights can be. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further - Kimmy

@Makindakan Hi Robyn, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks - Kimmy
@zanti Hi Santi, we’re looking into this now and appreciate your feedback. Thanks – Vi

@gillsy00 Hi John, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient it can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya

@Aliceshawly Hi Alice, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient it can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require assistance with your booking you may send us a DM so we can assist. Thanks - Paul

@JMaaxwell Hi Josh, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We appreciate a chance to look into this further. Thanks – Mauri
@jolitson Thanks for the feedback, Jo. I'm sure the rest of the team will love to hear this too. I'll pass this on. Thanks - Vi
